sys_script.description: When an adjustment needs to be made to either Outstanding Reserve (expense or indemnity), a new record is inserted into the Transaction Table with the activity type of "Update Expense Reserve" or "Update Indemnity Reserve". This rule calculates the difference between the current outstanding reserve and the adjusted outstanding reserve. A new transaction is generated to reflect the difference and the CAM-EXP-CalcReserves Business Rule takes over to recalculate the Reserve Record.
sys_script.name: CAM-EXP-ProcessActivity
